item.title: Building a Second Brain: A Proven Method to Organize Your Digital Life and Unlock Your Creative Potential
Digital Zettelkasten: Principles, Methods, & Examples
item.description: A short book with shallow content. The book presents some basic Zettelkasten ideas without proper speculations on how to make it work. It’s better to read How to Take Smart Notes
